createEventObject (createEventObject.html)

Create an event object to be issued via $rootScope.$broadcast. This is boradcastType = 'model', in the global configuration.

Paramaters

  • options { Object } - The current bindings options object.
  • item { Object } - The item which is the cause of the event.
  • verb { string } - Word describing the event (ie. event type).
  • data { Array } - Any data relating to the event
